metadata.Description: The inventory sheet for the main program to pull from
metadata.Author: Brianna Manning

items.name: Plate Armor
items.description: Heavy protective armor made of interlocking metal plates.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Light and flexible armor made from tanned leather.

items.name: Chain Shirt
items.description: A simple but effective shirt made of interlocking metal rings.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: A powerful ranged weapon made from a flexible curved wood or metal rod.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: A versatile and easily concealable melee weapon.

items.name: Greatsword
items.description: A massive two-handed sword capable of dealing devastating blows.

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
items.description: Grants the drinker the ability to become invisible for a limited time.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: Restores a small amount of hit points when consumed.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: Temporarily enhances the drinker's physical strength.

items.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
items.description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to blend into their surroundings.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's defenses.
items.stats: Grants +1 bonus to AC and saving throws

items.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
items.description: A wand that can shoot magical missiles at targets.
